question: You recently did a short cookery course. The cookery school has asked for your feedback on this course. Write a letter to the course director at the cookery scholl. In your letter, Describe what you enjoyed about the course Say how muchcooking you've done since the source suggest another cookery course you'd like the school to offer
text: Kindly be informed, that I have recently attended the culinary classes held at the “Park Street” last Thursday. I relished the various Non-veg cuisines learned during the class along with the cooking skills.

Furthermore, recently I hosted a house-warming party at my place and invited friends and families. I prepared chicken curry learned during the session and it was fantabulous. I added lemon- juice with spring onion for garnishing salad and it was indeed the cherry on the cake. I received much appreciation and shared the recipe with others as well. Many of my friends were interested to know about your next schedule of the jam sessions.

In addition, I would like to request you to schedule a cake baking classroom in the coming weeks as I have my daughter’s birthday in the next month and I am very keen to bake a delicious chocolate cake and choco cookies for her and her friends. I will forward the timings with my acquaintances.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
